go_data.justification: Vps45p serves as a link between Rab5 regulation of endosomal fusion events and regulation of endosomal SNARE complex formation.
Vps45p is involved in endosomal fusion events and SNARE complex formation, indicating its presence in endosomes.
Vps45p can complex with different syntaxin isoforms, such as Pep12p and Tlg2p.
